name: Wakoku Seiha Den
overview: Wakoku Seiha Den is a quiz game. The player chooses a province of Japan and then a district of that province to represent a team that participate in a elimination round-type championship first against other districts, and then on a national level. The player can select a category in which he or she wishes to compete. These include Japanese and world history, Japanese and world geography, as well as political and economical science. Each match requires a number of questions to be answered correctly for the team to win. All the questions must be answered within a time limit.
